sub_title: Ecorys International Development Unit for Long and Short Term Projects in EU28 and Developing Countries
summary:
Ecorys is an international policy research and  consultancy company, with 550 dedicated Ecorys consultants and over 150 associated freelance experts working on projects in more than 100 countries. Our consultants are specialist in research based consultancy on social, spatial and economic issues.

Since 1999 Ecorys has been involved in managing several FWCs as leading firm of a consortium, or as a partner firm in a consortium led by another firm. Most of these FWCs are for the EC.
Here is an overview of the FWCs (FWC SIEA 2018 - EuropeAid/138778/DH/SER/Multi) managed by the framework contracts unit. Please note that this list is not exhaustive and provided to give an idea of areas covered by our experienced framework contracts unit.

• Lot 2 - Infrastructure, sustainable growth and jobs
• Lot 3 - Human Rights, Democracy and Peace 
• Lot 4 - Human Development and safety net
• Lot 5 - Budget Support 
• Lot 6 - Innovative financing for Development

Apart the SIEA FWC, Ecorys is involved in the following EC FWC:

FWC COM 2015 – EuropeAid/137211/DH/SER/Multi: LOT 1:	Evaluation
CN 2015/S 052-089595: LOT 4: Policy Support Facility: Market access and trade & investment agreement negotiation & implementation
DG TRADE: Evaluation services to the EC in the field of trade

Ecorys has also been involved in FWCs for other Clients like the Canadian International Development Agency (CIDA), Department for International Development (DfID), Directorate-Generals (DGs), European Investment Bank (EIB), European Parlement (EP), etc.

For more information, please visit our websites: www.ecorys.nl/english and www.frameworkcontracts.eu. 

We are constantly looking for skilled and motivated freelance consultants willing to cooperate in Ecorys projects. If you would like to be part of our professional experts network, please send your CV to experts@ecorys.com. We will include it in our CV database and contact you with job opportunities fitting your expertise.

EXPERTISE: 
- Local and regional development
- Direct foreign investment
- Public transport and mobility
- Multi modal transport 
- Interacting with site selectors
- Water and environment
- Refreshing a well-known
- Drawing investors towards non-traditional investment locations
- Impact assessments 
- Smart Cities
- Marine, maritime and ports

Ecorys International Development Unit for Long and Short Term Projects in EU28 and Developing Countries

profile_positions.description:
WHO WE ARE
Ecorys is a research based consulting firm with a global reach, providing technical assistance and capacity building in more than 100 countries. Ecorys was founded in 2000 by a consortium of European consultancy agencies with a policy research history dating back to 1929. Ecorys is the first dedicated policy research and consultancy company in Europe.

WHAT WE DO
Our research and consultancy helps private and public leaders to make informed and well-founded decisions on social, spatial and economic issues. We focus on the development, implementation and evaluation of public policy. By achieving our client's goals, we aim to make a positive difference to society.

EXPERTISE
Ecorys helps private and public leaders with the development, implementation and evaluation of public policy. We provide technical assistance and capacity building on national and international development and cooperation programs. All our consultants are specialist in research based consultancy on social, spatial and economic development. 

CLIENTS
Ecorys has served private and public clients in the Dutch home market since 1929 on a broad range of policy assignments. Being the first research based consultancy company in Europe, we also have a solid track record on delivering development and cooperation programs for international clients.
profile_positions.title: Ecorys
